snippet: The hair, the face, the nails and everything in between from some of the first shows during New York Fashion Week, including BCBG, Richard Chai Love, Creatures of the Wind and Kimberly Orvitz.
abstract: The hair, the face, the nails and everything in between from some of the first shows during New York Fashion Week, including BCBG, Richard Chai Love, Creatures of the Wind and Kimberly Orvitz.
